entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
